creator: ucloudlink
descriptionHtml:
GlocalMe - Say goodbye to roaming fee! Get access to internet anytime, anywhere with GlocalMe service.
GlocalMe app is designed to manage your GlocalMe Wi-Fi device, top up, buy package, and check the data usage and device status.
GlocalMe service covers more than 100 countries and regions, including some top islands.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Column optimization with relocation of ”Recommend for you” to the first screen. In view of urgency of the coronavirus, the “data purchase and free mask giveaway” campaign is held for the users of Mainland China.

title: GlocalMe

creator: ucloudlink
descriptionHtml:
Our patented Cloud SIM technology allows users to dynamically choose the best network coverage, user experience with best cost effectiveness among all available mobile operators, taking into consideration current location.

GlocalMe app helps you improve the usage experience of GlocalMe mobile data service including to take control of WiFi device and data purchasing, manage and review.

Key features of GlocalMe app:
● Take a grant and control of your device, including battery and signal level, connectivity and “Data Usage Protection”
● 7/24 online customer service for speedy support
● Flexible data options for immediately buy and use with various online payment method
● Comprehensive account review on data usage, purchase order and invoice.

Why GlocalMe WiFi:
- Access internet offered by multiple operators
- Reliable speedy and secured connection
- Flexible and efficient data packages for local and international coverage
- Smart patented Cloud SIM technology for superior network experience

Details at : https://www.glocalme.com/cloudsim/why_glocalme_wifi

You can also follow our Facebook page to get more information about our service and app:
https://www.facebook.com/glocalme/

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Column optimization with relocation of ”Recommend for you” to the first screen. In view of urgency of the coronavirus, the “data purchase and free mask giveaway” campaign is held for the users of Mainland China.

creator: ucloudlink
descriptionHtml:
🌎Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions for traveling and business, without physical SIM and no roaming fees. Experience 5G high speed network in 55 countries and regions. 🔍Discover the easiest way to get online instantly with various data plans at affordable prices on GlocalMe. Join the GlocalMe network via portable WiFi devices powered by our patented cloud SIM technology, access the network conveniently in any country or region you traveled, enjoy a stable, fast, and secure connection, and save up to 90% on roaming costs.

🛜Global Network & Internet
• Get a high-speed network on your phone across 200+ countries and regions, and enjoy localized internet experience in 350+ carriers.
• Flexible data plans for multiple destinations, ranging from a single location, regional to global.
• Multi-telecom network convergence, select the best network dynamically or switch between carriers' mobile networks manually.
• Pay-as-you-go and super affordable, roaming free and no additional cost.

📶eSIM is Now Available
GlocalMe eSIM (virtual SIM or digital SIM) is now available for 40+ countries and regions, including:
• United States
• Japan
• Greater Bay Area of China(China mainland, Hong Kong, Macao)
• Europe (Austria, Estonia, Belgium, Iceland, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, French Guiana, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, Reunion, Gibraltar)
• South Korea
After the eSIM purchase, you will receive an email including a QR Code, scan the QR Code on your phone to install eSIM.

👨‍💼Exclusive Rights for CEOs
• Designed for high-end business people to enjoy the ultimate internet service experience.
• Includes 100GB/365-Day Package of global mobile data and up to 5G high-speed network experience.
Dedicated SVIP service, 1-to-1 customer service, 24-hour network quality assurance, and real-time response, handling, and recovery of network abnormalities.
• Gift annual VIP membership, including free mobile data, member goods, exclusive discounts, and other exclusive rights.

📍Smart Pet Tracker
• KeyTracker is a master of finding people, items, and pets. It supports GPS, AGPS, LBS, Bluetooth, WiFi, active radar, and self-developed multi-network and multi-base station positioning technology to realize precise positioning and searching.
• Tracking through the APP allows KeyTracker's built-in speakers to make a sound and identify the location by sound.
• The KeyTracker weighs 45 grams and comes with an emergency Internet access service, which can solve the need for temporary Internet access while traveling.

📱GlocalMe Intelligent Hardware
• Network sharing, up to 10 devices connected simultaneously, supports hidden WiFi to prevent network rubbing.
• Traffic protection smartly prevents other apps from automatically downloading and consuming cellular data, and manages the app's mobile data usage.
• Purchase GlocalMe hardware products from glocalme.com or Amazon.
• Existing users can exchange their old products for new ones to enjoy value-added returns.

🤔How to use GlocalMe?
1. Install GlocalMe.
2. Register an account and bind your device, the binding gift for a new device "1GB mobile data" is charged directly to your GlocalMe account.
3. Free trial of 1GB global mobile data.
4. Purchase a data plan for your destination in advance, GlocalMe network covers 200+ countries and regions, with tons of data plans to choose from;
5. Travel to your destination and get instant access to the internet.

💚Better connection empowers better life!

📲Contact Us
24/7 customer service.
Email: service@ucloudlink.com.
Website: glocalme.com.
Follow @GlocalMe Moments on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and X.
descriptionShort: Roaming WiFi for travel, connect to fast internet now!

creator: GlocalMe Apps
descriptionHtml:
🌎Stay Globally Connected with GlocalMe: Your Ultimate Travel Companion for 200+ Destinations!

🚀Seamless Connectivity for Travelers and Business Professionals GlocalMe keeps you online in over 200 countries and regions without the hassle of roaming charges. Our all-in-one data mall offers tailored plans to fit every need, ensuring fast and stable global internet access.

🔍Discover the easiest way to get online instantly with various data plans at affordable prices. With GlocalMe products, you can effortlessly connect to the internet in 200+ destinations worldwide through multi-carrier integration for a quality network experience.

🛜Global Internet Access
• Experience high-speed network on your phone in over 200 countries and regions, enjoy 5G speeds in 60 destinations, and access localized internet with 350+ carriers.
• Flexible data plans for multiple destinations, ranging from a single location, regional to global.
• Experience the network services of multiple operators, stay connected anytime, anywhere, and automatically switch to the best network.
• Cost-effecive, roaming free and no additional cost.

🤔How to use GlocalMe Portable WiFi?
1. Install the GlocalMe App.
2. Register an account and bind your device. A new device binding gift of "1.1GB of mobile data" will be credited directly to your GlocalMe account.
3. Enjoy a free trial of 1.1GB of global mobile data.
4. Purchase a data plan for your destination in advance. GlocalMe's network covers over 200 countries and regions, offering a wide selection of data plans.
5. Arrive at your destination and enjoy immediate internet access.

📶GlocalMe eSIM
A GlocalMe eSIM plan delivers an exceptionally convenient experience in seamless global connectivity. Our app offers a wide range of eSIM packages, ensuring you stay online no matter where you travel. Discover the easiest way to manage your eSIMs and data plans.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM, also known as a digital SIM or virtual SIM, is integrated directly into your smartphone and functions just like a traditional SIM card. With GlocalMe eSIM, you get instant access to internet data whenever you need it, without the hassle of visiting stores, waiting in lines, or struggling with your SIM tray. Enjoy a seamless and immediate internet connection with ease.

How does GlocalMe eSIM work?
1. Install the GlocalMe App.
2. Purchase an eSIM Plan. Open the app and go to Mall > GlocalMe SIM Mall > eSIM Standard.
3. Activate Your eSIM. After purchasing, click Review Order > eSIM Installation Instructions. Copy the activation code and follow the instructions. The whole process takes just a few minutes.
4. Connect to a Local network. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet as soon as you arrive at your destination.

GlocalMe eSIM are Available for:
• United States
• United Kingdom
• France
• Italy
• Germany
• Spain
• Portugal
• Japan
• South Korea
• China Mainland
• Hong Kong(China)
• Macao(China)
• Austria
...

eSIM FAQ

What is included in a GlocalMe eSIM plan?
A GlocalMe eSIM plan provides a specific amount of data (options include 5GB, 10GB, 20GB, etc.) that remains valid for a designated time frame (such as 3 days, 7 days, etc.). If your data allowance is exhausted or the validity period ends, you can conveniently purchase a new plan directly through the GlocalMe App.

Which devices are compatible with eSIM?
A regularly updated list of devices that support eSIM can be found at the provided link: https://mph5.ucloudlink.com/webmall/ota/faq/esim/faqDetail?faqIndex=0&langType=en-US. Please ensure to check this list to confirm if your device is eSIM-ready.

💚Better connection empowers better life!

📲Contact Us
24/7 customer service: Get support anytime through our mobile app.
Email: service@ucloudlink.com.
Website: glocalme.com.
Stay connect with us on social media @GlocalMeMoments on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok and @GlocalMe on Youtube

descriptionHtml:
🌎Stay Connected Worldwide! Enjoy stable, high-quality global connectivity in over 200 countries and regions—no roaming charges!

🔍Discover the GlocalMe All-in-One Data Mall: get tailored plans for every need and fast internet access at home and abroad with GlocalMe Mobile Hotspot and eSIM.

🛜GlocalMe Mobile Hotspot Features:
• Global Reach: High-speed internet in 200+ locations, with 5G access in 60 destinations and coverage from 350+ carriers.
• Flexible Plans: Choose from Fixed GB plans, Daily Passes, or Monthly Subscriptions tailored to you.
• Reliable Connectivity: Our multi-carrier network connects you to the strongest signal.
• Hassle-Free: No SIM cards, no roaming fees, and no hidden charges.
• Connect Together: Share your connection with multiple devices for family and friends.

🤔How to use GlocalMe Mobile Hotspot?
1. Install the GlocalMe App.
2. Create an account and link your mobile hotspot device.
3. Enjoy a free 1GB trial of global mobile data.
4. Purchase a data plan for your destination ahead of time.
5. Arrive and enjoy instant internet access!

📶GlocalMe eSIM
Experience unparalleled ease with GlocalMe's eSIM plans! Enjoy seamless global connectivity with just a few taps on your smartphone. Our app offers a diverse range of eSIM packages, ensuring you stay online effortlessly, wherever your travels take you.

⁉️What is an eSIM?
An eSIM, or digital SIM, is built directly into your smartphone, offering all the benefits of a traditional SIM card without any hassle. Get instant internet access in seconds—no need to visit stores, wait in lines, or deal with SIM trays. Just activate and go!

🤔How to Use GlocalMe eSIM?
1. Download the GlocalMe App.
2. Purchase Your eSIM Plan: Navigate to Mall > eSIMs & Travel SIM > eSIM Standard in the app.
3. Activate Your eSIM: After buying, simply go to Review Order > eSIM Installation Instructions. Copy the activation code and follow the quick setup process—it takes just minutes!
4. Connect Instantly: Upon arrival, turn on your eSIM and enjoy immediate internet access—connect right away!

GlocalMe eSIM packages for Major Regions:
• United Kingdom
• France
• Germany
• Italy
• Spain
• Portugal
• Poland

• Turkey

eSIM FAQ

What convenience does a GlocalMe eSIM plan offer?
Each plan includes a set data allowance (5GB, 10GB, 20GB, 50GB, etc.) valid for a set duration (3 days, 7 days, 30 days). If your data runs out or your plan expires, easily purchase a new one through the GlocalMe App—convenience at your fingertips!

Is my device compatible with eSIM?
Check our up-to-date list of eSIM-compatible devices: Device Compatibility to confirm your device is ready to go: https://mph5.ucloudlink.com/webmall/ota/faq/esim/faqDetail?faqIndex=0&langType=en-US.
